评论详情: This dress is made of great quality, perfect fit for the size , the colors are perfect to the picture.

Sequins are sharp metal & although there is a lining, it's not long enough to protect one's legs when they sit or around arm holes. For young girls, more fabric & less sequin area seems more practical. Sequins fall off as you open up the dress; must get worse when worn.
Grand daughter attended a Taylor Swift party - this was just perfect!  Beautifully made.

评论概述: Gorgeous and well made party dress !
评论详情: Absolutely love this dress ! I purchased this for my granddaughter .  I bought the Black/Green color. She loves it and everywhere she wears it everyone wants to know where she got it.  She and her mother went to  Disney World right before Christmas and everyone stopped them to ask about this dress.  The quality of this fabric is wonderful !  The sequins are all still on the dress…even after wearing it over and over.  Those who reviewed this dress were spot on when they said it holds up amazingly well.I love it and will probably buy it in another color!
7 year old granddaughter loved the shiny dress--a little on the heavy side with the sequins but she loved it.

The price was perfect, the fit and style is more than I expected. It has a lot of sequins, yet is very soft inside. It's difficult to find pretty dresses that aren't too short or low cut,  but this was perfect.  Dressy,  fancy,  but perfect for church and the holiday.
Must have!! My daughter loves her dress, she got so many compliments!
This dress is perfect and a little girls dream. We bought it for New Year’s Eve and she loves it. It is made well and not itchy (always a worry with littles). Also comes with a matching adorable bow.
Wonderful dress and the color was so bright for the night

This was so cute on my daughter. It’s well made, held up to a long night out running around, and my daughter got a bunch of compliments on her dress. It also comes with a matching bow. The zipper functioned well and it fit perfectly true to size if not on the slightly smaller end of that. Color is accurate. Overall a great value.
Fit perfect they loved it

This dress is shiny and beautiful. It fits perfectly. Tbr fabric on the inside is nice and comfortable although the outside is as you would expect for a sequence dress.  Most amount of money I have spent on a dress and worth every penny.  Wash on delicate and I hang dry it.  The quality for what you’re getting is worth it.  I want to buy her one in every color!
Prompt delivery
Such a beautiful little dress! Was perfect for my daughter to wear! She calls it her Glinda Dress! 🩷
I absolutely adore the trendy styles this store offers, fits my daughter very well, quality is great!
True to size, dress is very sparkly and comfortable. Well made and flattering.

The dress is very fancy, my daughter loves the sparkle! Lots of sequins but doesn't seem heavy feeling. True to size. Appears to be good quality but only tried on so will see how it holds up over the hours she wears it.  Not as full on the bottom, hangs more straight, but will easily fix that by adding a petticoat underneath for fluff. Would definitely buy again in other colors.
My neice felt like a princess in this dress.  It is comfortable, fits true to size and the perfect party dress.
Great fit and comfortable!
My daughter loves this dress

This dress is absolutely gorgeous! My daughters talk about how comfortable it is. The quality is great. The fit is absolutely perfect. The red was ordered for a small 7 year old who wears a size 6 and it fits her beautifully!
Quality material, not itchy at all. My daughter loved it and wore it without any complaints.

The Hot Pink color looks a little more vibrant in person, which I'm happy about because they match a hot pink pair of shoes that I got my daughter before ordering this dress. The sequins are sewn on very well, and overall the dress is great quality.
My daughter looks absolutely stunning in this dress. It twirls perfectly and it sparkles like no tomorrow! She gets so many compliments and to truly is perfect.
Kiddo loves it, it fits really well and made with good material. Looks exactly like the picture.

My daughter ordered this for a ball and it’s super cute. It fits well and is a good length on her (she’s tall so often things are too short!). It is good quality for the price, as I’ve come to expect with this brand. Definitely one of my Amazon go-to’s! My daughter’s only complaint it’s a bit itchy where her arms touch the sequins, but that is true of all sequined items!
My grandaughter, just turned 7, will not take this dress off. I bought the rose gold and it is an amazing dress. She twirls and dances and prances in it. Joyous.

So… what she did complain about was the itchiness. The dress is itchy because of the material. So not the best quality .  The dress also fits pretty well. And also has a gorgeous appearance .  Is it worth the price? I would say no, because they quality in the material.

My daughter is into rose gold so this caught my eye as a party dress or for special occasions. The dress is quite heavy, and somewhat itchy, but is very sparkly & has that 'spin' feature. It fits true to size and will be used for short parties, I'm not sure if she would wear this more than a couple of hours due to how itchy it is.

评论概述: True to size & excellent quality - GRACE KARIN continues to impress!
评论详情: I ordered this beautiful GRACE KARIN sequin dress in a size 10-12 for my 8yo daughter who will be turning 9 in just a couple of months. The fit was perfect and true to size and the quality was top-notch, as I've come to expect from this brand.  The sequins are beautiful, sparkly, and stay attached even after washing and wearing multiple times. The pleats give it a bit of a nostalgic look for me and the skirt section is perfect for twirling! I'm sure my daughter will wear this quite often, although the main reason I purchased it was for an upcoming daddy-daughter dance later this season. I purchased the exact same color of GRACE KARIN dress for my younger daughter as well, but in a sleeved style, so they'll be able to match wonderfully while still feeling like they each have their own unique style. I can't recommend the GRACE KARIN brand highly enough for young girls clothing. I have never been disappointed in any item I've ordered from this brand.
This dress is so beautiful and my granddaughter loves it. It fits her perfectly and is well-constructed.

The dress fits as it should and is very pretty.  My Granddaughter's only complaint was that while wearing it, the fabric felt "itchy" around her arm and neck areas.  We will do something about that to make it work for her because the dress is simply beautiful and she loves the style of it.
Very cute shiny dress for any event. Quality is nice. Fits great. Very cute fabric and bling.

My daughter loves purple and loves sequin. The dress feels quality as it is on the heavier side. The fit is nice and exactly what you would expect. The only issue is that some of the sequin has fallen off. There are also a few places on the dress where I can tell there is a defect. For the price, I expected a little more quality control. I would recommend buying something like this local so you can see the quality first hand before spending this type of money. I don't recommend.

评论概述: Perfect Birthday Dress - trust the brand and size chart
评论详情: My daughter is exactly 49 lbs and 49 inches.  We got the size 6-7 and the fit on her is beautiful.  She chose this dress as what she wanted to wear for her 8th birthday.  She has a lot of pretty dresses - many from this brand.  And this is the dress she chose for when we went out for her birthday dinner at a restaurant.  She's petite, but not that petite.  We knew to trust the size chart.  Size 6-7 was the right size for her, even though she was  turning 8 (and now is 8, because I'm writing this review a few days after her birthday celebration where she wore this).  You don't need to size up.  Trust the size chart.  And this brand is great.  We have a dozen or so items from Grace Karin.  Never heard of it a year ago, but now we know it and love it.

-Fits true to size and size chart -Quality made -Well sewn on sequins -Black mesh and lining leaves a trail of tiny black threads -Zipper runs smoothly -Smooth trim keeps the sequins from touching and scratching the skin -Bow works as intended, but pulls hair
Comes with a matching bow attached to hair elastic. Fits true to size, full hidden back zipper, front lining. Little wrinkly but steams out nicely
Such a cute dress!  Fits true to size, beautiful color.  Great quality, fabric is soft and light.  My daughter loves it.

评论概述: Very pretty and fits well. But the sequins under her arms are scratchy and uncomfortable.
评论详情: This dress is pretty and has a great “twirl” to it. It is a pretty medium deep lavender color which we actually love. The length and width fit perfectly. We ordered her regular size, even though I usually order up.  I needed her to be able to wear it soon, and it fits her exactly perfectly.  The inside is soft and comfortable, but the sequins under the arms are very scratchy and make it uncomfortable to move much.  After our event I am going to take some of the fabric from the inside and sew it under the armpits since it will match the colors already.
This is a beautiful dress for girls.  My daughter loves it!  We plan to have her wear it on our next cruise.  it is true to size and great quality.
Very beautiful dress Got this for my 8 yr old granddaughter She loves it Perfect fit Very nice quality Good fit

Such a pretty dress that screams party and fun and all things sparkly. Dress is lined so not an itchy interior. The 10/12 fits my 11 year old who is on the smaller/shorter side. Matching bow included.

评论概述: Grace Karin dresses are always adorable
评论详情: My daughter loves these Grace Karin dresses. The sequins are always a hit with little girls. The dress is made well and comes with a matching cute bow. My only complaint is they run a little on the expensive side, but I just buy them big so my daughter can enjoy them longer to get more use out of them.
I mean is a prom dress style? I mean maybe but regardless it's a cute dress and the color and sparkle is fantastic! My little one love wearing to to be fancy and it really is adorable.

Although this dress is a very cute design and my niece will absolutely love the sparkle and twirl in the skirt it is not the best quality. Came with a flaw in the sequin right on the front so doubtful it will last long.

Really cute. The material is nice although a bit heavy. The sequins can catch on things and shed. I would go up one size if you have a taller child. Great dress for parties, formal occasions or just for fun.

评论概述: Needs to be packaged better to preserve the pleats
评论详情: This sequined dress comes in a wide variety of sizes and pretty colors. It is very sparkly and has a wonderful twirly skirt. For a sequined dress, this is fairly soft and my daughter said it doesn't feel itchy. The big issue here is that the way this is packaged in a plastic bag really messes up the pleats in the skirt and there is no real way to steam or iron this to get the pleats back in place without ruining the dress.  This unfortunately affects the way the dress hangs and looks. My daughter doesn't care and loves the sparkly purple and the "twirl factor" but I don't like the fact that the skirt is off.  I did try washing this according to the care directions and unfortunately this didn't help, and there was a lot of shedding of sequins in my machine. This is a pretty dress, and my daughter loves it, but the skirt is an issue for me.
This beautiful dress comes with a matching bow. Ordered in the size 5-6. Really pretty dress. Makes my daughter feel like a princess.

Love it. Fits well, maybe runs a little small. I got a size up and it's loose, but not as much as I expected. My daughter loves it and says it isn't too scratchy on her arms. Very pretty dress and the hairband is a nice touch.

评论概述: Perfect Twirl Factor, but not for wearing all day
评论详情: This dress sparkles and twirls and is just beautiful. The seams are well done and there is no fraying. I would give this dress 5 stars all day long if it wasn't for the fact that my daughter wore this dress for half a day and had sores under her arms from rubbing on the sequence. I also don't like the sequence on the tie. It makes it difficult to tie it nicely. It also causes the sequence to start falling off. Speaking of falling off, if you plan on having this dress worn more than once I don't foresee this washing well over the long term. I have washed it twice, inside out and hung it up to dry, and there were a lot of sequence left in the washer after the second wash. Not enough to notice any missing on the dress, but given that it was only washed twice, once when it came, and once after being worn, that the sequence have already started to com off. My daughter loves the dress, and she will enjoy it while it lasts.
Stunning well made gorgeous dress and bow. The dress reflects light like beautiful fairy dust. Fits perfectly. Absolutely gorgeous!!!!!
